product_name: Moving Comfort Foxie Tank Top - Women's
long_description: Offering a flattering fit over a sports bra, the racerback-style Moving Comfort Foxie Tank Top for women brings comfort to each workout session using moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric. Mesh racerback increases breathability; fabric offers UV protection with a UPF rating of 50+. Envelope pocket at center back stores accessories and works with a media player. The Moving Comfort Foxie tank top offers a next-to-skin fit.
short_description: Offering a flattering fit over a sports bra, the racerback-style Moving Comfort Foxie Tank Top for women brings comfort to each workout session using moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric.
